item.title: Free will, ego, and morals
item.description: May 2, 2022: I am having second thoughts about this topic. It can become an endless chain of thoughts, not leading to anything of substance. The term “free will” is hard to define. Also, apparently this post is of low quality (according to /r/philosophy). There are different types of free will that I was not aware of. I will read up on them, and update the post sometime in future.

item.title: Visualizing time relativeness
item.description: What is this? What does a billion years mean to you? Does replacing years with something else help? It is hard to grasp that number. Our universe came into existence about 13.6 billion years ago. What does human existence mean in this timespan? This is an attempt in trying to build a perspective for the time and in a way, large numbers. How? Let’s try out two methods: Map large numbers to smaller ones we can relate with.
